name: Pier Pressure (itch) (MidnightBaker)
description:
Yuki is almost late for her part time job in the stall at the end of the pier. Can you help her make it there on time? Run as fast as you can and collect blue watches to give Yuki more time. Beware, touching red watches will take time away! Yuki can run really fast but is clumsy, so any objects she bumps into will be instantly destroyed. 

Good luck!

Created By: Simon Massad

Music From: https://www.free-stock-music.com/eu-genius-vacation-time.html

Sound FX From: https://freesound.org/

3d Models From: https://vroid.com/, https://free3d.com/, https://www.cgtrader.com/
